bibl.title: Roman Amphorae from Fayum Oasis.
bibl.note: Archaeological Mission of Pisa and Messina, 2000 and 2001. - 8 wine amphorae found in a cellar (late 2nd to 3rd century A.D.). Capacity: 7,5 and 8,5 / 9 litres.

bibl.title: Jean-Claude GOYON et Christine CARDIN (Edd. / Édd.), Proceedings of the Ninth International Congress of Egyptologists / Actes du neuvième Congrès international des égyptologues, Grenoble, 6-12 septembre 2004. Volume II

bibl.seg: SILVANO F., M. P. COLOMBINI, F. MODUGNO and E. RIBECHINI, Roman Amphorae from Fayum Oasis (Medinet Madi).

Jean-Claude GOYON et Christine CARDIN (Edd. / Édd.), Proceedings of the Ninth International Congress of Egyptologists / Actes du neuvième Congrès international des égyptologues, Grenoble, 6-12 septembre 2004. Volume II = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 150 (Leuven - Paris - Dudley, MA, 2007) pp. 1705-1711, 8 profils, 3 figg.
Archaeological Mission of Pisa and Messina, 2000 and 2001. - 8 wine amphorae found in a cellar (late 2nd to 3rd century A.D.). Capacity: 7,5 and 8,5 / 9 litres.
